tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor's experience and knowledge was helpful in treatment of my acute problem. She is friendly through out the treatment process. I recommend her for other patients

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very knowledgable about the medical problem and her experience helped in solving the issues. Also very friendly during treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Karthikha madam was extremely patient and very sweetly guided me with my pregnancy and post delivery period. She was there throughout my delivery and helped me through all the issues. It was a boon to have had her as my gynaec and without a second thought will go to her for my next delivery as well. I have already referred several of my friends to her and all of them have been very satisfied with her detailed explanations and treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very much satisfied with Dr. Karthikha. She explained the condition to us in detail. The surgery was done laparoscopically, I was discharged on the very next day and am feeling well after the procedure. I would recommend GEM hospital and Dr. Karthikha for any uterus related issues.

tags: None
review: Dr.karthika madam Is so sweet and kind ...the way of explaining the disease ,counselling us for choosing better treatment option is very amazing ...I will be cured without taking any medication after her sweet talk ..thank you madam ..you are such a nice doctor madam ..god bless you ..I recommend this doctor for better care and treatment for any uterus related problem and infertility ..

tags: None
review: The doctor was very much friendly and calm. All the concerns were taken care off and she walked through withthe whole process patiently

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She is such an energetic and charming person. Over all she is very confident with her work and addresses the whole problem comprehensively!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very friendly doctor. Went to her for pre pregnancy counselling. Definitely will recommend her for infertility and pregnancy check up

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very happy with the doctor.. There was very minimal waiting time... Very friendly doctor... Listen to the complaints very patiently and treats very nicely....

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Felt great and confident after visiting the doctor......... Would highly recommend her for gynaec problems....
